summary: The spirit of Mata Nui leaves to a faraway wasteland, when he and his people are conquered. There he helps unite 2 villages. They ask him to help defend the villages against the real enemy, the Skrall and Bone Hunters.
cast: Dee Bradley Baker|Jeff Bennett|Jim Cummings|Michael Dorn|Mark Famiglietti|David Leisure|Armin Shimerman|Marla Sokoloff|Fred Tatasciore|James Arnold Taylor
title: Bionicle: The Legend Reborn
